Change Log

This project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](http://semver.org).

**September 14th, 2018**  
* Added a change-log.
* Fixed botched URL in `package.json` file.
* Transferred repository to [`file-icons`][] org on GitHub.

[`file-icons`]: https://github.com/file-icons
